availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Dennis (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Dennis. Father of Annie E. Dennis, Mary E. Dennis, Lydia A. Dennis, and Carra Dennis. Farmer in Spencer County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Spencer County in 1850. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District 1, p. 89A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District No. 1, p. 9.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Ward 6, p. 375.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Ward 10, p. 360B.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007128, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 297.
